original_title: 仮面ライダー平成ジェネレーションズFINAL ビルド＆エグゼイドwithレジェンドライダー
overview: Kamen Riders Build and Ex-Aid team up with the legendary heroes of the Heisei Generation - OOO, Fourze, Gaim, and Ghost.
tagline: The strongest heroes gather! In the face of the evil scientist's plan to exterminate humanity, 6 warriors will stand up and fight.
title: Kamen Rider Heisei Generations FINAL: Build & Ex-Aid with Legend Riders
